short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to make browsing the web easier with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily interact with content on any webpage by activating this powerful AI tool. Simply press Cmd + K (on Mac) to open the extension in your current tab and start asking questions instantly.

Popular Use Cases:

1. Summarize Articles – Get concise overviews of content from sources like HackerNews, Reddit, and more.
2. Quick Information Lookup – Effortlessly locate key details on pages such as developer documentation, car forums, and beyond.
3. Personalized LinkedIn Outreach – Craft customized outreach messages for your LinkedIn connections with ease.
4. Review Analysis – Analyze feedback and reviews from platforms like Airbnb, Amazon, and others for quick insights.

Data Privacy and Collection:
1. Your Privacy Matters – The extension only accesses the content of your current tab when you open the extension popup (either by clicking the icon or using the Cmd + K shortcut).
2. How We Handle Data – When you ask a question, we send the content of the webpage and your query to an AI language model (LLM). None of this data is stored on our servers; it is strictly proxied to the LLM.
3. Usage Metrics – We collect basic usage metrics, such as the hostname of the URL where the extension is used, to help us understand user behavior and continuously improve the extension.


Got Questions or Feedback?
Join our community on https://discord.gg/3T37mU9v to share your thoughts and ideas.
